thread.title_full: Cornerstone Information Systems Announces Workforce Expansion and Ground Breaking for New Headquarters in Bloomington Indiana

author: Press Contact: Patricia Brusha
title: Cornerstone Information Systems Announces Workforce Expansion and Ground Breaking for New Headquarters in Bloomington Indiana
text:
Cornerstone Information Systems , a leader in the development of software applications for travel management companies and corporations, announced today their plans to aggressively expand their workforce to support their phenomenal year-over-year growth. Demand for their mainline iBank and iQCX services has increased by an average of over 11% per 12-month period, while growth in use by the largest enterprise clients, boasting up to a $25 million in travel budgets, has increased an average of 22%. Cornerstone has also seen more than 15% boost in the overall transactional usage of their hosted software systems.
Earlier this summer Cornerstone introduced two new solutions, the 4site™ mobile app and TravelOptix™ data visualization and analytics software platform. Officially launching later in October 2015, the two new software solutions will deliver actionable data to create higher efficiencies and optimize travel for corporations and their business travelers.
“We’ve seen an outstanding response to our existing products, and with the introduction of TravelOptix™ and 4site™, we want to scale to meet the increasing demand,” states Mat Orrego CEO Cornerstone Information Systems. “Additionally we are investing in a new corporate head office to accommodate our future growth and take the company to the next level.”
Cornerstone is actively recruiting for various positions including Sales and Account Management, Delivery and Implementation Consultants, Project Managers, Data Scientist, and Software Engineers. Construction on the new head office in downtown Bloomington will begin in October with an expected completion date in early 2017.
“We are proud of our presence and involvement in the Bloomington community and plan to keep our growing employment base centered here as we continue to expand, invest and succeed,” adds Orrego. “We have been based here since our founding in 1992 and are thrilled to contribute to the thriving Indiana technology sector.”
Individuals interested in applying for positions can send their resume to ask(at)ciswired or see a full listing of employment opportunities at http://www.ciswired.com .
About Cornerstone
Cornerstone Information Systems delivers innovative solutions for travel companies and their clients to maximize opportunities for higher performance, greater efficiency, and ultimately, higher profitability. Our unique core offerings provide clients and their respective travelers with data insights that enable them to make better business decisions and manage their trips more effectively to be more productive and cost conscious. Companies managing more than $25 billion in travel spend annually trust Cornerstone to help them proactively lower the costs of travel management and drive revenues through travel optimization. Founded in 1992, Cornerstone Information Systems is a privately held company headquartered in Bloomington, Indiana with customers in more than 50 countries.
